text: Inline speed skating is the roller sport of racing on inline skates. The sport may also be called inline racing by participants. == Other websites == *Inline Speed Skater The leading source for inline speed skating news, information, skater profiles, videos, and race results. *Big Wheel Blading Online Magazine focusing on all disciplines of Big Wheel Blading *International Federation of Roller Sports *World Speed Records *British Skating Legends * *Bont Skates Category:Speed skating
title: Inline speed skating
